content: Hello, I am a student Electrical and Computer Engineering student at Aristotle University of Thessaloniki. I am interesting to work for the visual design on Zulipâ€™s logged-out pages and zulip.org in general. I am not sure though if you are still interest for a project like these. Also I do not know what real open source contribution to do in this specific topic for Zulip so I could demostrate my work.

Hey, nice to have you on board!
I feel like you might get some clarity regarding the things you asked about if you go through this contributor guideline. When it comes to actually making contributions, you'll probably need to start your contributions by setting up your dev. env first. Additionally, if you're unsure about the various places where you can help out, you can go through the work summaries for previous GSoC students and go through the github issue log for beginner friendly issues.

Hope you have a fun time around here! :)
Also, I had never heard about Thessaloniki before, but it looks like such a beautiful place! :heart:.
